name: Mystic Shepherd
description:
Welcome Mystic Shepherd.

You must keep the herd alive, but in order to do this sacrifices must be made.
The temple on the left make your sheep be more fertile.
The temple on the right make grow more food.
Your sheep need to eat food to survive.
The herd will follow you, bring them to the temple to sacrifice them.
(WASD or arrow key to move)

Don't run out of food or sheep.

-

Audio: wololo sound is my rendition of the Age of Empires classic
